SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Department of Health Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN HEALTH CANADA REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) ensure that the regulations are clear, accurate, and serve to minimize the possibility of misinterpretation; and (2) update the regulations to reflect current terminology and remove any outdated references.
